title: change summoner name
body: i want to change my name to "logic" i want it so badly the one who have that name didn't play leagueoflegends since season 5 can i have this name pls!

replies.body: Each name is protected per the [summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) guide for a limited time.  We don't have info to provide on any specific date, so you'll have to regularly check the store.
By that "logic" everyone would be able to get the names they wanted when they wanted it.
